metadata.description: `Panel` is a background that organizes content in an application. It uses color to reflect the level of importance of content and drive visual hierarchy.

examples.name: Primary
Secondary
examples.description: Use the secondary variant as the background to color block less important content.

examples.name: Tertiary
examples.description: Use the tertiary variant as an alternative background to the secondary variant or as an additional option to color block in a layout.

when_to_use: To organize and divide the application into clear content areas.
To create visual hierarchy within the application layout.
With the [`BorderLayout`](/salt/components/border-layout/) component to define the main content regions of your application with responsive behavior.
